title: Keys
description: Keys is an iOS password management app. Users are able to store passwords and other sensitive data and access that data securely. Keys utilizes the Zero Trust framework to ensure user's data is kept secure.

title: Translator Extension App
description: The translator Extension is a google chrome extension developed in react using Microsoft Azure's Speech Recognition API. Users can translate audio from videos to different languages on websites that do not offer subtitles in different translations.

title: Campus Buddy
description: Campus Buddy is an app on both iOS and Android that helps users connect with other students on their campus. It was written using flutter for the frontend and a mix of Node, Express, Python and Flask for the backend services.

title: Days on Market Predictor
description: Developed a neural network and XGBoost model to predict the time a property would stay on the housing market using a data set of housing sales from across the U.S. Achieived an average error of 137 days using the Tensorflow neural network and 205 days using the XGBoost model.

title: Neural Network
description: Created a neural network using Python and NumPy from scratch. Utilized back propagation and gradient descent to improve model performance and achieve a lower loss with training of the model.

title: Pathways
description: Pathways is an iOS app written in Objective-C that allows users to keep track of their physical paths and save them along with notable landmarks along the way.
